page.title: 20Broomhaugh First School.
page.content:
The information on this disk was collected and recorded by twenty 4th and 5th year children of Broomhaugh First School Riding Mill Northumberland during June and July of 1985. Their names are as follows:-
4th years. Steven Law Rachel White Katy Harle Claire McCarthy Mark Watson Richie Gibson Sarah Wooldridge Beccy Page Richard Scott Andrew Eakins Richard Sandiford.
5th years. David Goddard Stuart White Tania Robinson James Young Paul Robinson Jennifer Pickering Caroline Downs Nicholas Christophides Christopher Cheetham.
